mapper.select: SELECT c.content_id, c.content_name, TO_CHAR(h.homework_deadline, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS homework_deadline, h.homework_content_leader, h.homework_content_learner, (SELECT user_name FROM users WHERE user_id = h.user_id_leader) AS user_id_leader FROM homework h, users u, content c WHERE u.user_id = h.user_id_learner AND u.user_id = #{user_id} AND h.content_id = c.content_id ORDER BY h.homework_deadline ASC
select content_name from users, homework, content where users.user_id = #{user_id} and #{user_id} = homework.user_id_learner and homework.content_id = content.content_id
select group_id from groups where group_id = #{group_id};
select count(*) from users left join learner_group on users.user_id = learner_group.user_id_learner where user_type = 2 and group_id is not null and user_id = #{user_id}
